attributes.action: lagalise the use of semi-auto centre fire rifles in the uk as section 1
attributes.additional_details: i would like to petition the law abiding citizens that hold section 1 firearms licences,that have already been through all the necessary checks to show that they are responsible gun owners should have the right to own semi - auto centre fire rifles for target and hunting.Why should everybody that has never had any issues with this be persicuted for the actions of a few
